modName: No heavy muscular walk and idle
summary: Changes the heavy muscular idle animation for the skinny animation.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/sSbds.png[/img][/url][/center]



When I start skyrim I made a skinny character but when equipped some armours I noticed that he acted as he was heavy muscular so I replaced the muscular idle for the skinny idle and now armours that had muscular idles have now normal idles.

Installation:extract the meshes doler to skyrimÂ´s data folder wich can be found in steam\\steamapps\\commons

It affects all NPC as well as female.

Note:Changing the idle also affects how the character walks so with this mod he walks normal.
author: Scot

files.name: Different filepath as requested in comments
